page.title: 07EATING OUT IN ABERDOUR
page.content: In our area there are many restaurants and cafes all of them are in the village of{Aberdour.}One of them is an {Italian}restaurant called{"La Toscana" where the favorite food's are fish and meat cooked{Italian}style.Other places to eat are a cafe called{"Upstairs {Downstairs"}and a{"coffee and snack {shop"}in the High street.We did a survey and discovered that roughly{30% of the children in our class say their parents go out for a meal in {Aberdour}.Since{Aberdour}is a holiday resort there are many hotels that do bar lunches,among them are the {"Woodside Hotel"}the{"Aberdour Hotel" and the{"Fairways Hotel".}Out of 100 children{64%}of them go out for a meal every month and{8%}go out every week.
